SEARCH
Package net.jandie1505.playerlevels.api.core.reward

Schnittstelle Reward

Alle bekannten Unterschnittstellen:
IntervalReward, MilestoneReward
Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
IntervalReward, MilestoneReward, Reward
public interface Reward
A reward a player will receive for reaching a specific level.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    @NotNull net.kyori.adventure.text.Component
    getDescription()
    Description of the reward.
    @NotNull net.kyori.adventure.text.Component
    getDescription(int level)
    Returns the description.
    A description can be dependent on the level of a player.
    @NotNull String
    getId()
    This is the unique id of the upgrade.
    int
    getLimit()
    Returns the level limit.
    Levels after this limit are not checked for this reward.
    That means, if the reward unlocks on level 50, but the limit is set to 49, the reward will not be applied
    This is useful for limiting IntervalRewards, for example, you get a reward each level, but only until level 50.
    @NotNull String
    getName()
    Name of the reward.
    @Nullable String
    getServerId()
    This is the server id where the upgrade has to be applied.
    If the value is null, the upgrade can be applied on all servers.
    boolean
    isEnabled()
    Returns if the upgrade is enabled.
    boolean
    requiresOnlinePlayer()
    Returns if the player needs to be online that the reward can be applied.
    void
    setEnabled(boolean enabled)
    Enables/disables the upgrade.
    This will prevent the upgrade from applying to players.

  • Methodendetails

    • getId

      @NotNull @NotNull String getId()
      This is the unique id of the upgrade.
      Gibt zurück:
      upgrade id

    • getServerId

      @Nullable @Nullable String getServerId()
      This is the server id where the upgrade has to be applied.
      If the value is null, the upgrade can be applied on all servers.
      Gibt zurück:
      server id

    • requiresOnlinePlayer

      boolean requiresOnlinePlayer()
      Returns if the player needs to be online that the reward can be applied.
      Gibt zurück:
      true = the player must be online

    • getLimit

      int getLimit()
      Returns the level limit.
      Levels after this limit are not checked for this reward.
      That means, if the reward unlocks on level 50, but the limit is set to 49, the reward will not be applied
      This is useful for limiting IntervalRewards, for example, you get a reward each level, but only until level 50.
      Gibt zurück:
      limit

    • isEnabled

      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns if the upgrade is enabled.
      Gibt zurück:
      enabled

    • setEnabled

      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables/disables the upgrade.
      This will prevent the upgrade from applying to players.
      Parameter:
      enabled - enable

    • getName

      @NotNull @NotNull String getName()
      Name of the reward.
      Gibt zurück:
      name

    • getDescription

      @Experimental @NotNull @NotNull net.kyori.adventure.text.Component getDescription(int level)
      Returns the description.
      A description can be dependent on the level of a player.
      Parameter:
      level - level (-1 if not provided)
      Gibt zurück:
      description
